com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list
Class ListTagUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list.ListTagUtil

public class ListTagUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Provides various utility functions for the ListTag, ColumnTag, and SpanTag

Method Detail

incrementPersistentCounter

public static java.lang.Long incrementPersistentCounter(PageContext ctx,
                                                        java.lang.String name)
Increments a "persistent" counter. These counters are used by column tags to track and increment values across column render passes.

Parameters:
ctx - active PageContext
name - name of counter
Returns:
next value

makeParamsLink

public static java.lang.String makeParamsLink(ServletRequest request,
                                              java.lang.String listName,
                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paramsToAdd,
                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramsToIgnore)
Returns a link containing the URL + ALL the parameters of the request query string minus the sort links, and the alpha link + the additional params passed in the paramsToAdd map. The resulting string is urlEncode'd with & encoded as & so it can be used in a href directly.

Parameters:
request - the Servlet Request
listName - the current list name
paramsToAdd - the params you might want to append to the url for example makeSortLink passes in sortByLabel while alpha bar passes in params that are specific to it.
paramsToIgnore - params to not include that would be normally
Returns:
a link containing the URL + (OtherParams - Sort - Alpha) + paramsToAdd

makeColumnSortLink

public static java.lang.String makeColumnSortLink(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                  java.lang.String listName,
                                                  java.lang.String attrName,
                                                  java.lang.String sortDir)
Builds sort link

Parameters:
request - current request
listName - list's unique name
attrName - attribute to sort on
sortDir - sort direction: RequestContext.SORT_ASC for ascending, RequestContext.SORT_DESC for descending
Returns:
link

renderFilterUI

public static void renderFilterUI(PageContext pageContext,
                                  ListFilter filter,
                                  java.lang.String uniqueName,
                                  java.lang.String width,
                                  int columnCount,
                                  boolean searchParent,
                                  boolean searchChild)
                           throws JspException
Renders the filter UI

Parameters:
pageContext - caller's page context
filter - ListFilter instance
uniqueName - name of the list
width - width of the list
columnCount - list's column count
searchParent - true if list tag allows searching of parent
searchChild - true if the list tag allows searching of child
Throws:
JspException - if something bad happens writing to the page
